components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 DODGE STRATUS.  WHILE IDLING, THE VEHICLE SURGES FORWARD SPORADICALLY WITHOUT WARNING.  WHEN THE FAILURE OCCURS THE RPM'S RAPIDLY INCREASE AND BRAKING CAPABILITY IS REDUCED.  THE CONTACT TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER NUMEROUS TIMES, BUT THEY CANNOT DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE.  THE FAILURE HAS NOT BEEN REMEDIED.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 40,000 AND CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 56,500.    UPDATED 6/8/09 *CN  THE CONSUMER STATED WHEN STOPPED AT A LIGHT, THE ENGINE WOULD SUDDENLY START TO RACE JUST OVER 2000 RPM'S. UPDATED 06/11/09.*JB
